definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: A good omnidirectional microphone is a must.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的全向麦克风是必须的。

sentences.english: Both two reprojection unwarpings do not depend on a particular model or accurate parameters of omni-directional system.
sentences.chinese: 这种重投影展开不依赖于精确的全向相机模型参数。

sentences.english: The designation of horizon polarized half omnidirectional is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 水平极化半全向天线，用传统方法实现具有较大难度。

sentences.english: Omnidirectional light originates in one point and shines equally in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 全向光是从一个点发出的，并平均地照射各个方向。

definition: to control (the course of sth)/to guide (a missile)
driving force/impetus/thrust (of a boat or aeroplane engine)/repelling force
